overview: A young paramedic goes to the Middle East in search of work. A loving woman follows her husband. The family of a theologian teacher goes to a hot spot in the hope of finding the true faith... They are all hostages of their delusions. Their dreams are not destined to come true, because war never brings happinessâ€¦ About the rescue of compatriots trapped in Syria by the Uzbek authorities.
title: Captivity
